issue.title: [Python] Add CUDA API docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4216](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4216). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since parsing the CUDA API docstrings would require building Arrow with CUDA enabled, it would be better to make it conditional, for example using the [ifconfig](https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/extensions/ifconfig.html) Sphinx extension.
